agt Indictment carrying concealed weapons

The parties appeared by their attornies and waive a trial by jury and Submit the law and facts of the case to the judgment of the court and being heard it is adjudged by the court that the plaintiff recover of the defendant fifty dollars and that he pay the costs of this indictment
